Posts.EditableText: How to create a chest and grab items from inside the chest
Posts.HTML: How to create a chest and grab items from inside the chest

Posts.EditableText:
On the chest's "features" tab, tick the one that mentions containers.

This will make a 'container' tab appear. On that tab, change the container type to "closed container" (probably what you want).

Put objects inside it.
Posts.HTML:
On the chest's "features" tab, tick the one that mentions containers.

This will make a 'container' tab appear. On that tab, change the container type to "closed container" (probably what you want).

Put objects inside it.
